这里记载了くりこ的强化学习笔记（真的是复习笔记）

Key Concepts

参考：https://spinningup.openai.com/en/latest/spinningup/rl_intro.html

  1. states and observation: 通常记作 state: \(s\), observation: \(o\)

  2. action space

  3. policies 确定性策略：\(a_t = \mu (s_t)\) 随机策略：\(a_t \sim \pi(\cdot | s_t)\) 当策略依赖于参数时，记作：\(a_t = \mu_\theta(s_t), a_t \sim \pi_\theta(\cdot | s_t)\)

  4. 确定性(deterministic)策略：某个状态 \(s\) 的策略应当是固定的，其概率应该始终为1，不会发生改变

  5. 随机(stochastic)策略：从状态集 \(S\) 到动作集 \(A\) 的条件概率分布，即 \(\pi_S(A|S)\) 动作是从分布中 sample 得到的

    参考：https://zhuanlan.zhihu.com/p/136020868

    随机策略里面两个比较重要的计算：

    1. sampling actions from the policy
    2. and computing log likelihoods of particualr actions: \(log\pi_\theta(a|s)\)

  6. Trajectories: a sequence of states and actions in the world, noted as \(\tau\), \(\tau = (s_0, a_0, s_1, a_1, \dots)\)

    初始状态一般是从 start-state distribution 中采样得到： \(s_0 \sim p_0(\cdot)\)

    状态转移(State transitions): \(s_{t+1} = f(s_t, a_t)\) 或者 \(s_{t+1} \sim P(\cdot | s_t, a_t)\)

    Trajectories are also frequently called episodes or rollouts

  7. Reward and Return \(r_t = R(s_t, a_t, s_{t+1})\) 引入折扣因子(discount factor) \(\gamma \in (0, 1)\), \(R(\tau) = \sum_{t=0}^{\infty}{\gamma^t r_t}\)。

RL Problem

the goal in RL is to select

a policy which maximizes expected return when the agent acts according to it.l

在随机策略下，一个 \(\tau\)-steps 的 trajectory 的概率是

\[ \begin{align*} P(\tau | \pi) &= \rho_0(s_0) \Pi_{t=0}^{T-1} P(s_{t+1} | s_t, a_t) \pi(a_t | s_t) \\\\ J(\pi) &= \int_\tau P(\tau | \pi) R(\tau) = E_{\tau \sim \pi} [R(\tau) \\\\ \pi^* &= \arg \max_\pi J(\pi) \end{align*} \]

Value Functions（值函数）

Bellman Equation

The value of your starting point is the reward you expect to get from being there, plus the value of wherever you land next.
